General_Description: '''Tummy Troubles''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A soldier sought help. Kassandra answered.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]]. *'''Note:'''
''The food here is terrible. If you can help, come see me.'' She sought out the soldier and addressed him.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped the soldier with his food problem.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''

Structured_Dialogue.content: Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]].

*'''Note:'''
''The food here is terrible. If you can help, come see me.''
She sought out the soldier and addressed him.
